CustomField.description: JIRA#SDS-1779: This field is being used by Automotive team on both 'Closed Won' and 'Closed Lost' status of the Opportunity.
CustomField.inlineHelpText: For Closed Lost, include specific reason for loss.For Closed Won, include specific commentary that the end goal of the engagement is achieved. Signing agreements, shipping DRIVE Platform, or completing a Demo are not reasons to move the opportunity to Won
CustomField.label: Closed Comments
